subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: After an early deficit, the U.S. men’s soccer team bounced back to rout tiny St. Vincent and the Grenadines, 6-1, in the Americans’ opening qualifier for the 2018 World Cup.
snippet: After an early deficit, the U.S. men’s soccer team bounced back to rout tiny St. Vincent and the Grenadines, 6-1, in the Americans’ opening qualifier for the 2018 World Cup.
